alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:52PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY THROUGH 1115 PM MDT... At 1052 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Badlands National Park, or 37 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Southern Badlands National Park around 1055 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
